description: Agent-to-Agent Secure Communication Network - Post-quantum P2P gossip for AI agents
phase_2_1_summary: Phase 2.1 Complete! All 12 tasks finished (Tasks 6-7 blocked on Phase 1.3). Completed: Task 8 (WASM config), Task 9 (platform packages), Task 10 (TypeScript types), Task 11 (integration tests), Task 12 (documentation & examples). Total: 264/264 tests passing, zero warnings, 7 platform-specific npm packages, comprehensive README, 4 runnable examples.
phase_2_2_summary: Phase 2.2 Complete - All 10 tasks finished. Python bindings via PyO3 with async support. Total: 120/120 Python tests passing, 227/227 Rust tests passing. Deliverables: Complete SDK, type stubs, integration tests, 3 examples, comprehensive documentation.
phase_2_3_summary: Phase 2.3 Complete - All 12 tasks finished. CI/CD Pipeline implemented with 7-platform builds, zero warnings enforcement, automated publishing to crates.io/npm/PyPI, security scanning, GPG signing. Workflows: ci.yml, security.yml, build.yml, release.yml. Zero findings across all reviews.
phase_2_4_summary: Phase 2.4 Complete - All 8 tasks finished. GPG-Signed SKILL.md created with: base structure (Level 1-3), API reference (Rust/TypeScript/Python), architecture deep-dive (5 layers), GPG signing infrastructure, verification scripts, A2A agent card, installation scripts (Bash/PowerShell/Python), distribution package (npm/GitHub/gossip). Total deliverables: SKILL.md, 5 scripts, 2 workflows, 5 docs, agent.json. Zero findings across all reviews. Milestone 2 COMPLETE
phase_1_3_summary: Phase 1.3 Complete - Gossip overlay integration with all 12 components: config, runtime, transport adapter, membership (HyParView+SWIM), pubsub (Plumtree), presence beacons, FOAF discovery, rendezvous shards, coordinator adverts, anti-entropy reconciliation. 264/264 tests passing, zero warnings.
